description.value:
Your biological circuitry emits light like a torch, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). The light shuts off when you take this action again or are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious].

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Radiant Circuitry]
